com.yantra.ycp.japi.ue

Interface YCPDeterminePrintJobNameUE


  • public interface YCPDeterminePrintJobNameUE
    User exit that determines pass file name to be printed.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      org.w3c.dom.Document determinePrintJobName(YFSEnvironment env, org.w3c.dom.Document inXML)
      The YCPDeterminePrintJobNameUE user exit is called by the printDocumentSet API.

    • Method Detail

      • determinePrintJobName

        org.w3c.dom.Document determinePrintJobName(YFSEnvironment env,
                                           org.w3c.dom.Document inXML)
                                    throws com.yantra.yfs.japi.YFSUserExitException

        The YCPDeterminePrintJobNameUE user exit is called by the printDocumentSet API. Implement the method in this interface to customize the logic of determining the job name for the print request for the given parameters. It is expected to return the name for the print request generated during printDocumentSet API. The system calls the methods in your class. If this method gives any exception, the current transaction is rolled back. Print job name helps in tracking the status of print request. Hence, print job name needs to be meaningful. The user exit is supplied with a boolean value, FlushToPrinter, to indicate whether the document will be sent to printer or is saved in a preconfigured folder, to be printed at a later time. The job name could be decided on the document that is being printed and the printer on which it is being printed.

        The user exit implementation can get the enterprise code from the environment variable by calling the getUEParam(String variable) method.

        Example : env.getUEParam("EnterpriseCode")


        Related Yantra Documents
        Input XML Input DTD Output XML Output DTD

        Pre-conditions: This user exit is invoked after executing the default logic for determining the print job name.

        Post-conditions: The return parameter is a XML containing the name of the print job, as determined by the user extension.


        Parameters:
        env - Required. Environment handle returned by the createEnvironment API. This is required for the user exit to raise errors and access environment information.
        inXML - Required. Any XML document that contains a sufficient amount of data as required by the getLabelFormat API. For more information, see the associated input xml files.


        Returns:
        A valid output XML as determined by the user exit. For details on the output, refer to the associated output files.


        Throws:
        com.yantra.yfs.japi.YFSUserExitException - This exception is thrown whenever system errors that the application cannot handle are encountered. The transaction is aborted and changes are rolled back.
